dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1866 IH: Stop Animal Fat Tax Credits Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Weber of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to disallow certain biodiesel and alternative fuel tax credits for fuels derived from animal fats.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop Animal Fat Tax Credits Act of 2017.

section.header: Disallowance of biodiesel and alternative fuel credits for fuels derived from animal fats

paragraph.text: Section 40A(d)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking or animal.
Section 40A(d)(2) of such Code is amended by striking , and from animal fats.
Section 40A(f)(3) of such Code is amended by inserting (other than animal fats) after biomass.

subsection.text: The last sentence of subsection (d)(2) of section 6426 of such Code is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking or any and inserting any; and
by inserting before the period at the end , or any fuel derived from animal fats.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to fuel sold or used after December 31, 2016.
